stories.text:
Dear <redacted>,

Our records indicate that you are using the Wasabi service and you are either located in Russia or associated with a Russian banking institution. As a result of the recent sanctions against Russia, we are no longer able to conduct business. Per Section 7.2(c)(ii)(B) of the Customer Agreement, we can terminate immediately upon notice in order to comply with the law. Therefore, we will be deleting your account from our system. We would like to have you take whatever steps you need to copy your data stored in our system. Please do so within the next 48 business hours. After that time, your account access will be suspended and the process to delete your account will begin.

If you believe that you have received this notification in error, please respond to this email right away with the details.

Again, we ask that you please respond to this email to let us know your intentions. If we do not hear back from you within 48 hours, we will begin the process to suspend and then terminating your Wasabi account.

Regards, Wasabi Sales Operations
stories.title: Wasabi termenates Russian accounts with just 48h notice period
